title: Ferguson Activist Responds To Grand Jury Decision
teaser: Tory Russell, co-founder of the group Hands Up United, reacts to the decision not to indict the officer who fatally shot Michael Brown.
contentencoded:
Tory Russell, co-founder of the group Hands Up United, joins Here & Now’s Lisa Mullins to respond to the grand jury’s decision not to indict the police officer who fatally shot 18-year-old Michael Brown.

  • Hear our previous conversation with Tory Russell on Nov. 18
  • Documents: Grand jury evidence
  • Documents: Officer Wilson’s testimony

Guest

  • Tory Russell, co-founder of Hands Up United. He tweets @HotepTNT.
